txt.en:
Congratulations on buying a house! Be sure to pay your weekly upkeep. You can pay up to 26 weeks in advance via the housing management panel.

You can see information about your house in the House panel which can be accessed via the Start menu under 'Character'.

To visit your house, use the travel button on the House panel, use the Travel to Personal House skill, or enter the Neighbourhood Gate on the landscape.

Owning a house gives you a discount to purchases from the vendors in your neighbourhood as well as a new skill which allows you to travel instantly to your new home.
